Name: Sisters of Mercy Congregation, West Perth

About.Hours & facilities:
Open for research by appointment Mon - Tues 1pm - 4pm 


General reference assistance available.

About.Access: Advance notice of visit required. Access to records not normally available for research can be gained with permission of Congregational Superior.

About.Acquisition focus: Material from various convents and schools of the congregation. (98% in-house).

About.Major holdings:
Sisters of Mercy Congregation, West Perth: Historical Material of Congregation 1897- ; Chapter Records 1897- ; Minutes of Meetings 1959- ; Photographs 1903- ; Schools 1910- .
	Conference of Major Superiors of Australia and WA: Minutes of meetings and newsletters.
	Institute of Sisters of Mercy, Australia: History, Chapters, Correspondence 1981- .
	Church in WA: History of Association with Church.

Contact.Street address: St Brigid's Convent of Mercy, 60 John Street, Northbridge WA 6003
